title: "Uunituore" casual sans, written in chalk
content:
Anyone have an idea what this is? O looks customed. Any similar typefaces?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [IMG\_0285.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20100101093726/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_0285.JPG) | 138.15 KB |
author: HiekkaGraphics

comments.content:
Look very handwritten to me!  
You could try this:  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/profonts/pedell/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100101093726/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/profonts/pedell/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/profonts/pedell/")

You said it in the header... “written in chalk.”

Since it is so casual, almost ill-informed, you could do it with chalk, conte pencil and/or a “dry brush.” Then cut and paste :-)

Michael

\> _You said it in the header... “written in chalk.”_

_I_ said it in the header. ;^)

It’s nice to see you back Yves.

For the chalk styles, including Pedell, here’s the [MyFonts search results](http://web.archive.org/web/20100101093726/http:/new.myfonts.com/tags/chalk/) for ’chalk’.

- Mike Yanega
